com.hissain.jscipy.signal

Class Convolve

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hissain.jscipy.signal.Convolve

  • public class Convolve
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for signal convolution. Provides 1D and 2D convolution operations with various boundary modes.



    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Convolve() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      double[] convolve(double[] signal, double[] window, ConvolutionMode mode)
      Convolves two 1D signals.
      double[][] convolve2d(double[][] in1, double[][] in2, ConvolutionMode mode)
      Convolves two 2D signals (matrices).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Convolve

        public Convolve()

    • Method Detail

      • convolve

        public double[] convolve(double[] signal,
                         double[] window,
                         ConvolutionMode mode)
        Convolves two 1D signals.
        Parameters:
        signal - The input signal.
        window - The kernel/window to convolve with.
        mode - The convolution mode (FULL, SAME, VALID).
        Returns:
        The convolved signal.

      • convolve2d

        public double[][] convolve2d(double[][] in1,
                             double[][] in2,
                             ConvolutionMode mode)
        Convolves two 2D signals (matrices).
        Parameters:
        in1 - The first input matrix.
        in2 - The second input matrix (kernel).
        mode - The convolution mode (FULL, SAME, VALID).
        Returns:
        The convolved matrix.
